title: #新手作業 python list
content:
作答:
ironman_list = ["kuan","Chen"]
print('S- name:', ironman_list[-1])
print('S- name:', ironman_list[0]) 
ironman_list = ["7010","7210"]
print('ID', ironman_list[0]) 
print('ID', ironman_list[-1]) 
ironman_list = ["2","90000"]
print('Shift & Rate', ironman_list[0]) 
print('Shift & Rate', ironman_list[-1])
ironman_list = ["10.22","2.4"]
print('Salary & Bonus', ironman_list[0])
print('Salary & Bonus', ironman_list[-1])
錯誤:
S- name: Chen, ID:555, Salary:10000, Bonus:5.5
S- name: kuan,
ID 7010
ID: 777,210
Shift & Rate 2
Shift & Rate 90000
Salary:20000, & Bonus:7 10.722
S- name:Lin, ID:999, Salary:30000, & Bonus:9 2.94

題目:
請寫3個class建立成員資料
class 1 建立基本資料 Name & ID
class 2 建立員工(W)資料 Shift & Rate
class 3 建立主管(S)資料 Salary & Bonus

http://i.imgur.com/uZtkdsg.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/JmjPhux.jpg
請問錯誤的部分怎麼修改?
感謝
excerpt: 作答：ironman_list = ［"kuan"，"Chen"］，print（'S- name：'， ironman_list［-1］），print（'S- name：'， ironman_list
